paper.title: Automata for modeling real-time systems
paper.venue: International Colloquium on Automata, Languages and Programming
paper.abstract: To model the behavior of finite-state asynchronous real-time systems we propose the notion of timed Buchi automata (TBA). TBAs are Buchi automata coupled with a mechanism to express constant bounds on the timing delays between system events. These automata accept languages of timed traces, traces in which each event has an associated real-valued time of occurrence.
